Uses of Interface
com.ojcoleman.europa.configurable.Observer

  • Packages that use Observer 
    Package Description
    com.ojcoleman.europa.configurable
    Contains classes for building a - typically hierarchically structured - collection of parametrised components that can be configured via a JSON configuration file.
    com.ojcoleman.europa.core
    Contains mostly interfaces and abstract classes that form the core components of an evolutionary algorithm.
    com.ojcoleman.europa.monitor  
    com.ojcoleman.europa.populations
    Contains various implementations of Population.

    • Uses of Observer in com.ojcoleman.europa.configurable

      Methods in com.ojcoleman.europa.configurable with parameters of type Observer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Observable.addEventListener(Observer listener)
      Add the given observer to this subject.
      void Observable.removeEventListener(Observer listener)
      Remove the given observer from this subject.

    • Uses of Observer in com.ojcoleman.europa.core

      Classes in com.ojcoleman.europa.core that implement Observer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Monitor
      Base class of classes that monitor the state of the evolutionary process.
      class  Population<G extends Genotype<?>,F extends Function<?,?>>
      Represents the population of Individuals in the evolutionary algorithm.

    • Uses of Observer in com.ojcoleman.europa.monitor

      Classes in com.ojcoleman.europa.monitor that implement Observer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConfigMonitor
      Implementation of Monitor that prints out the configuration for the Run in JSON format to a file called config.json.
      class  DebugMonitor
      Implementation of Monitor that prints out debug information.
      class  FileOrCLIMonitor
      Base class for a Monitor that prints to the standard output stream (console) and/or a file.
      class  FittestMonitor
      Implementation of Monitor that records information about the fittest individual.
      class  OverviewMonitor
      Implementation of Monitor that prints out a line of statistics every N generations to the standard output (console).
      class  SelectiveMonitor
      Base class for a Monitor that prints info for the user-specified classes and event names to the standard output stream (console) and/or a file.

      DefaultEvolver population class.
